charges.charge_description: POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE AND DISTRIBUTION OF COCAINE BASE, 21:841A=CD.F(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment to run concurrently on each count. 48 months supervised release to run concurrently on each count. The defendant is prohibited from possessing a firearm, destructive device, or other dangerous weapon The defendant shall participate in a program for substance abuse counseling as directed by United States Probation Office, Which Program may include testing not to exceed 104 drug test per year to determine if defendant has reverted to using alcohol or drugs. The Defendant shall be required to contribute to the cost of services for such treatment based on ability to pay or availability of third- party payment. The Defendant shall use his true name and is prohibited from the use of any aliases, false dates of birth, false social security numbers, incorrect places of birth, and any other pertinent incorrect information. $200 special assessment fee to be paid immediately.
